flawed_nl_solution:
From each tire repair, he made 20-5=$<<20-5=15>>15 profit
So repairs made him a profit of 15*300=$<<15*300=4500>>4500
The two complex repairs each made him 300-50=$<<300-50=240>>240 profit
So those added 240*2=$<<240*2=480>>480
So his total profit from everything was 4500+480+2000=$<<4500+480+2000=6980>>6980
So he made a profit of 6980-4000=$<<6980-4000=2980>>2980
#### 2980

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 250, not 240. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
